data.name: There is No Stairs
data.detailed_description:
There Is No Stairs
Another pain here...No, there is a platformer game. Follow the bird who stole the blueprint!
Although there are no stairs in the world, a reliable rocket launcher is with you instead.

◇ Aim Under Your Feet and Shoot

◇ Jump higher and farther with the recoil of a rocket explosion!

◇ Go After That [s]Freaking[/s] Pigeon Bird!

◇ The timing of exquisite aiming and jumping is the key to success.

◇ Progress Is Not Saved.

◇ Feel how much you're improving every time you fall!

◇ If you can get the blueprint back, this year's Bonel Award will be yours!


"Isn't it faster to draw a blueprint again?" - Assistant A.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Thousands of rocket jump accidents are reported worldwide every year. Unfortunately, a bald inventor here also lost legs trying to get up to the second floor. But he wasn't frustrated. Now he is designing an unprecedented new invention, dreaming of a world without rocket jumps... It's the stairs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window7
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce gtx 670 | Radeon HD7950
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window10
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX960
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
